root.name: Super Columns
root.description: OverviewSuper Columns is a puzzle game developed and published by Sega for the Game Gear platform.GameplaySuper Columns is a Game Gear entry in Sega's Columns franchise. Lines of 3 gems will fall from the top of the screen and will continue to fall without a players involvement.Players can manipulate by moving the gems to the right or left and switch the gems to a different location in the set of three.Game ModesSuper Columns contains three modes of play:EndlessStoryFlash
